name: Poly CV
description: This algorithm takes the polysynth control logic from the other polysynths and uses it not to produce sound, but to output CVs and gates. This makes it most obviously useful as a MIDI/CV converter, but it can also be used as a chord/arpeggio engine controlled by CV/gate inputs. Please refer to the section “Common polysynth features” above.

parameters.name: ES-5 Expander
parameters.description: If set, the ES-5 expander header to use for gate outputs instead of the bus specified by the First output parameter. "1" means the ES-5 itself.

parameters.name: ES-5 Output
parameters.description: If using an ES-5 expander output for gates, sets which of the 8 outputs on the expander to use as the starting output.

input_ports.name: MIDI channel
input_ports.description: The MIDI channel to listen on.

input_ports.name: MPE channels
input_ports.description: Controls how the algorithm will respond to MPE.

input_ports.name: Sustain mode
input_ports.description: The standard polysynth sustain mode parameter. See above.

input_ports.name: Sustain
input_ports.description: Directly controls the sustain (like a MIDI sustain pedal).

input_ports.name: Min vel gate
input_ports.description: Sets the minimum gate voltage, if the gates are set to be scaled by velocity. Velocity gates range from this voltage (for MIDI velocity 0) up to 5V (for MIDI velocity 127).

output_ports.name: Voices
output_ports.description: The number of voices to use (up to the maximum set by the specification.

output_ports.name: First output
output_ports.description: The first output bus to use.

output_ports.name: Gate outputs
output_ports.description: Whether to include gate outputs. If set to ‘Velocity’, the gate outputs are scaled by the note velocity.

output_ports.name: Pitch outputs
output_ports.description: Whether to include pitch CV outputs.

output_ports.name: Gate mode
output_ports.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above for gate outputs.

output_ports.name: Pitch mode
output_ports.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above for pitch CV outputs.

output_ports.name: Velocity mode
output_ports.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above for velocity outputs.
